title: Boris Johnson and Jeremy Corbyn set to make TV history with first head-to-head election debates
text:
Boris Johnson and Jeremy Corbyn are set to stage the first ever head-to-head TV election debates after Labour signalled it would not take part alongside Jo Swinson.

A Downing Street source last night said the Conservatives were “willing to show the country the choice it has between getting Brexit done with Boris Johnson versus the lack of leadership under Jeremy Corbyn”.

A one-to-one debate between the leaders of the two largest parties would make television history.
